author: Digital Foundry
description:
Digital Foundry is now fully independent! Join the DF Supporter Program and support the team: https://bit.ly/3jEGjvx

Lauded for its phenomenal performance, the truth is that Battlefield 6's ultra and overkill settings are exactly that - opening the door to some phenomenal performance boosts with barely noticeable visual differences via optimised settings. Alex takes you through his thoughts on the game, how to improve performance, how CPUs scale and much, much more.

Go here to check out DF merch! https://store.digitalfoundry.net

Subscribe for more Digital Foundry: http://bit.ly/DFSubscribe

00:00:00 Introduction 
00:01:00 Optimised Settings
00:06:15 GPU/CPU Testing
00:10:43 Bugs and Concluding Remarks
title: Battlefield 6 PC - DF Review + Optimised Settings - +72% Perf Boost For Little Visual Loss
